author: Matthias Mulvey
content:
You should write about Sally snowman (still alive), the last lighthouse Keeper at Boston Light.
Sally is still an employee of the USCG and for decades has been a Coxswain/Instructor/Member Training Officer in the USCGAUX. A truly remarkable person.
Sally’s email is sally@bostonlightkeeper.com

V/r,
Matthias J. Mulvey
USCGAUX 1NR
Division 12 Commander
Instructor Specialist, Vessel Examiner
ADSO-EM Sector Boston, TCO
28 Edgeworth Street
Weymouth, MA 02189-2405
